The platform collects and secures documents and data intelligently – extracting, organizing and sharing content with your enterprise’s people, business systems and processes.

position_against_competitors: Product Description The Efficy extendable CRM platform (xCRM) organizes, automates and synchronizes rules, marketing, sales and customer service. The platform collects and secures documents and data intelligently – extracting, organizing and sharing content with your enterprise’s people, business systems and processes.  Our CRM solutions are customisable based on your organisation's size and needs, therefore fit for small to large companies. We work based on a leading European CRM mindset while keeping local customers in mind. You don't have to compromise on performance or data security to have a personalised experience. That is why we have CRM solutions available in your local language. The features and benefits that make us stand out: - More for less. A flexible CRM for the best price. - Available at anytime, anywhere, on any device. - Take a new approach to learning and productivity with our gamification capabilities. Seller Details Seller Efficy Year Founded 2005 HQ Location Brussels, Belgium Twitter @efficy_en 1,106 Twitter followers LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 418 employees on LinkedIn® LB Overview Provided by: Laetitia Baret
overview: At last, a CRM solution that truly adapts to your needs. Efficy is a major player in the European CRM market. With our personalised range of solutions, we're already trusted by over 13.500 clients and 330.000 users across 60 countries. We want to help our clients succeed by providing the tools they need to make their employees’ work easier, and their customers happier. Our CRM solutions are the most flexible on the market. We enhance the productivity of your marketing, sales and customer service teams by providing a range of CRM tools. Our expert teams are always at your service - we can adapt your CRM solution to your organisation, processes, teams, projects, sales structure, customer support and help desk system. Don’t waste time on administrative tasks - empower your employees and grow your business with Efficy CRM. Boost your commercial efforts with our AI-based contact enrichment tool. By analyzing emails, it automatically fills in missing information about your prospects and clients, such as their job title, company, or contact details. Thanks to this analysis, our solution can naturally trigger workflows to automate tasks, alert certain users via notifications, and much more. Discover our artificial intelligence solution that analyzes the emotions expressed by your customers in the emails they send you or the support tickets created on your client portal. By quickly interpreting whether a sentiment is positive, negative, or neutral, you can proactively respond to the needs and concerns of your clientele.

description: SalesBoss is an all-in-one sales, marketing, communications, and automation software platform for local businesses across industries, including home services, retail, automotive, real estate, professional services, and more. SalesBoss combines the power of sales, marketing, sms, email, calls, calendar, webchat, inbox, pipeline, reviews, payments, websites, and automation in one AI-powered solution. From lead capture and nurturing to deal closing and customer retention, Salesboss helps you manage your entire sales pipeline on one easy-to-use platform. Plus, its built-in automation capabilities save time and increase efficiency by automating repetitive tasks.

overview: SalesBoss is an all-in-one sales, marketing, communications, and automation software platform for local businesses across industries, including home services, retail, automotive, real estate, professional services, and more. SalesBoss combines the power of Sales, Marketing, SMS, Email, Calls, Calendar, Webchat, Inbox, Pipeline, Reviews, Payments, Websites, Funnels, and Automation in one AI-powered solution. From lead capture and nurturing to deal closing and customer retention, Salesboss helps you manage your entire sales pipeline on one easy-to-use platform. Local Businesses can organize their data, generate more leads, create strong pipelines, and close more deals faster.

description: Yetiforce helps companies best utilize free professional opensource CRM to lower costs and improve performance throughout the entire communication structure.
languages_supported: Bulgarian, German, Greek, English, French, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovenian, Spanish, Turkish
position_against_competitors: Product Description Yetiforce helps companies best utilize free professional opensource CRM to lower costs and improve performance throughout the entire communication structure.  YetiForce CRM offers a complete and affordable customer relationship management (CRM) business solution that helps each type of business succeded. With YetiForce CRM, you get powerful CRM software delivered in the cloud, hosted, or on premises. Our open source CRM software is founded on three core principles: complexity of tools for business of any size, scalability, and software free of charge. It means that you pay only for hosting (if you need one), technical support, or for your individual customization. We do offer as complex CRM as our the biggest competitors for significantly less money. Affordability means no cost for each user in your organisation. You can start with a free trial and decide if we're right for your company. With over 25 000 users worldwide, 10+ language versions, and 80+ modules we offer great product for less money than our competitors. Seller Details Seller YetiForce Year Founded 2014 HQ Location Warszawa, Woj. mazowieckie Twitter @YetiForceEN 747 Twitter followers LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 10 employees on LinkedIn® G Overview Provided by: Bartosz
overview: YetiForce is a multidimensional CRM application that gathers all information related to sales, marketing, projects, support, human resources, bookkeeping, warehouses and many more. Originally forked from Vtiger, YetiForce evolved into an independent, truly open source and always free-to-use project, that constantly develops and strives to become the most advanced and versatile CRM system. YetiForce is equipped with over 100 configuration panels, so the system becomes very flexible and can be easily tailored to any business profile. In 2017, YetiForceCRM was named #1 Most Affordable CRM Software in Capterra's ranking. There were more than 500 different CRM applications listed, but YetiForce was chosen as the Number 1. In 2018, the YetiForce company won the "Supplier of the year 2017" title in the IT category in the PROCON Awards competition.

overview: Increase revenue, nurture customer relationships, and analyse your performance with our award-winning CRM platform. webCRM is flexible and customisable based on your business needs. The best part? Get up and running faster than ever. The founders of webCRM decided to create their own CRM system, as they considered the systems on the market to be overly complicated. Therefore, you can now choose a cloud-based CRM system that provides a complete overview and makes it simple to follow up with your clients. That’s webCRM. Our mission remains unchanged - a truly good CRM system is an uncomplicated tool that makes every workday easier. Let your team take care of the customers, and webCRM will handle everything else.

description: FinCRM providing Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software and Full Stack Office Management solutions. description: Fireberry is end-to-end business management platform tailored for your business specific needs. From sales to customer service, and more, Fireberry makes it easy for your entire business to work together. We offer a powerful, flexible, affordable, quick to implement platform designed for the end user. We have combined all the tools a business needs into one product to meet the needs of every business - including yours. With Fireberry you can close more deals, provide better customer service and gain critical business insights. Easy -to use, Easy-to customize, and easy- to scale CRM platform.

position_against_competitors: Product Description Fireberry is end-to-end business management platform tailored for your business specific needs. From sales to customer service, and more, Fireberry makes it easy for your entire business to work together. We offer a powerful, flexible, affordable, quick to implement platform designed for the end user. We have combined all the tools a business needs into one product to meet the needs of every business - including yours. With Fireberry you can close more deals, provide better customer service and gain critical business insights. Easy -to use, Easy-to customize, and easy- to scale CRM platform.  At Fireberry, we differentiate ourselves in the competitive CRM market through our commitment to user experience, customization, and innovation. Firstly, Fireberry is dedicated to providing a user-friendly CRM solution. Our platform boasts a clean interface and streamlined workflows, ensuring that users can quickly adopt and effectively utilize our software without extensive training. Secondly, we prioritize customization and flexibility. Recognizing that every business has unique needs, Fireberry offers highly customizable fields, layouts, dashboards, and reports. This empowers our customers to tailor the CRM to their specific requirements, maximizing the software's effectiveness. Lastly, Fireberry is committed to innovation. We invest heavily in research and development to offer cutting-edge features and functionality, such as artificial intelligence for predictive analytics and seamless integration with third-party applications. This dedication allows us to deliver ongoing value and remain at the forefront of CRM technology. Seller Details Seller Fireberry Company Website www.fireberry.com Year Founded 2012 HQ Location Tel Aviv, Israel LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 45 employees on LinkedIn® FC Overview Provided by: Fireberry CRM
overview: Fireberry is an all-in-one, customizable CRM platform created to centralize all of the moving parts necessary to build, grow, and maintain a SMB. Fireberry provides a modular CRM solution that meets the evolving needs of its customers and sets them up for success in the long term; distinguishing itself through its focus on user experience, customization, and innovation. Accelerate workflows and pipelines with Fireberry’s automations and data-analytics. Customize dashboards to highlight the real-time data that you need. No need to pay for multiple microservices, whatever you need is a part of the system. Centralize your work with built-in integrations with Google, Office 365, and Facebook. Easily integrate other third party services or programs using custom APIs.

description: Freshsales is a sales CRM built to help you stop juggling between multiple tools. It’s ideal for small businesses and refreshing for enterprises.
seller_description: Freshworks makes it fast and easy for businesses to delight their customers and employees. We do this by taking a fresh approach to building and delivering software-as-a-service that’s affordable, quick to implement, and designed for the end-user. Unlike legacy software, Freshworks builds tech that works for everyone, making it easy for IT, customer service, sales, marketers, and HR to do their job and delight their customers. More than 50,000 companies use Freshworks’ SaaS to enable a better customer experience (CX, CRM) and employee experience (ITSM, HRSM).

position_against_competitors: Product Description Freshsales is a sales CRM built to help you stop juggling between multiple tools. It’s ideal for small businesses and refreshing for enterprises.  Freshsales comes with a powerful feature set available at an affordable price point. With ease-of-use at its core, Freshsales CRM helps businesses to quickly organize contacts through simple drag-and-drop, get a snapshot of the customers, and send an email or phone call to the prospects in one click. Sellers can improve conversions with multichannel engagement capabilities. Freshsales CRM is comprehensive and is built for businesses of all sizes. With quick onboarding and out-of-the-box templates, SMBs and startups can go live in less than 24 hours and experience faster time-to-value. Enterprise-grade features like customization to meet the business needs, security settings, CPQ, and sandbox are tailored to enable large-size sales teams to personalize engagement at scale and expand revenue. Seller Details Seller Freshworks Company Website www.freshworks.com Year Founded 2010 HQ Location San Mateo, CA Twitter @FreshworksInc 18,869 Twitter followers LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 8,591 employees on LinkedIn® Ownership NASDAQ: FRSH Phone +1 (866) 832-3090 Description Freshworks makes it fast and easy for businesses to delight their customers and employees. We do this by taking a fresh approach to building and delivering software-as-a-service that’s affordable, quick to implement, and designed for the end-user. Unlike legacy software, Freshworks builds tech that works for everyone, making it easy for IT, customer service, sales, marketers, and HR to do their job and delight their customers. More than 50,000 companies use Freshworks’ SaaS to enable a better customer experience (CX, CRM) and employee experience (ITSM, HRSM). HP Overview Provided by: Hitesh Patiyal
overview: Freshsales is an easy-to-use, AI-powered sales CRM software. Trusted by 65,000+ businesses worldwide, Freshsales CRM helps sales teams attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, grow sales pipeline, boost conversions, and power productivity. Freshsales CRM provides a 360-degree view of contacts and accounts to empower sales teams with context to sell better. Sellers can manage sales pipelines to visualize deal progress and define and track sales targets. Sales teams can effortlessly engage with prospects and customers with the built-in phone, email, and chat capabilities. Advanced automation features like workflows and sales sequences boost sales productivity and ensure better prospecting. Freddy AI in Freshsales helps sellers draft contextual sales emails, receive actionable deal insights, and never miss out on revenue opportunities.

description: Ambivo is an all-in-one digital SaaS platform for small businesses and medium-sized companies. Built with modern generative AI capabilities to drive business insights.Ambivo helps businesses focus on their customers and sales by engaging with leads, effectively converting leads to customers, automating processes, and increasing the productivity of employees. Ambivo provides free CRM for one user, lead/sales pipeline management, task management, invoice integration, integrated payments, and many other features like integrated calendars, file and document sharing, and a website chatbot with full analytics and reporting capabilities. With free onboarding and a dedicated account manager, be up and running in an hour. Ambivo also provides businesses with full 100% white glove service; whatever your need is, whether it is to run marketing campaigns, create or manage a website, engage with your customers, generate invoices, and get paid on time, the Ambivo team will take care of it for you. Trusted by 100s of users, Ambivo is the fastest way to Amplify your Biz Voltage!
overview: Ambivo is an all-in-one Gen-AI digital platform for growing businesses. With its comprehensive CRM functionality, Email and SMS marketing, task management, customizable Widgets, and more. Ambivo enables enterprises to enhance productivity, streamline workflows, and focus on what matters most—building meaningful customer connections. A business trifecta includes customers, communications, and finances. It requires an average of 4 software systems to make this work. So we decided to do something about it. Ambivo not only offers a complete software platform to run your business; it will also provide a 100% white glove service to help create your digital presence with a website and an e-marketing program

description: Breakcold is a Sales CRM for with social media integrations with LinkedIn & Twitter. It's a new type of Sales CRM, a Social Selling CRM. You can natively inside the CRM like and comment the social media posts of your B2B contacts to bond faster with them or create curated feeds of your different B2B contacts. Breakcold is for SMBs (eg. Agencies, Consultants, Coaches & early-stage Startups).
seller_description: We believe that automation is not the answer to everything but that data aggregation and smart automation will allow you to truly focus on what you should be doing: building relationships with your prospects to make easy sales.
overview: Breakcold is a Sales CRM where you can engage & contact B2B contacts via Email, LinkedIn & Twitter. It's a Social Selling CRM for SMBs & Startups.

description: At the core of the TeleSuite is the philosophy of engagement, insight, and experience. The suite is designed to provide you with the tools you need to engage with your customers and team members more effectively, gain valuable insights into your communication processes, and create an exceptional user experience for everyone involved. With TeleVoice, for example, you can engage with your customers in real-time, providing them with personalized support and guidance. TeleMeet enables you to host virtual meetings that are more engaging and productive, while TeleChat allows you to communicate with team members and customers in a more natural and intuitive way. TeleDigital and TeleCRM provide you with valuable insights into your communication processes, allowing you to analyze data and gain actionable insights that can help you improve your communication and marketing strategies. And with TeleSMS and TeleMail, you can create engaging and personalized messages that resonate with your customers and help you build lasting relationships TeleSuite is a secure and cost-effective communication solution that provides a range of features and capabilities to enhance your business communication and collaboration. By combining engagement, insight, and experience philosophy with low cost and security, the suite offers a complete and affordable solution for businesses looking to optimize their communication processes and improve their bottom line.

description: WakeUpSales is an open source CRM tool that boost sales, manage deals and grow business exponentially by adding visibility to sales pipeline.
languages_supported: Arabic, English, French, Hindi, Armenian, Dutch, Albanian
overview: Wakeupsales CRM is an all-in-one customer relationship management tool to streamline your sales activities, improve productivity and create powerful customer relationships. It is a very user-friendly cloud CRM suited for teams of all sizes. It is popularly used by sales teams across IT, real estate, digital agencies, and online travel agencies, consulting and professional services firms to maintain full control of their sales pipeline, improve deal closure rates & build lasting customer relationships. In other words, Wakeupsales helps sales folks save time and become more effective by taking care of every-day problems like unorganized database, overlapping assignments, multiple tool handling, manual management of contacts, jumbled up spreadsheets, poor relationships with customers, lesser business visibility or even sales funnel leakage. This free CRM is available on cloud, on-premises and android platforms. Wakeupsales CRM has really made lives easier for people from more than 30 countries. Wakeupsales cloud CRM onboarding takes less than a minute. Just sign up and you're good to go. More so, every signup comes with a 30days free trial that gives you access to our premium features. Once you're through with the trial, you get to choose between a free-forever plan and our powerful PRO plan which literally brings out the best in the CRM. The on-premises version of Wakeupsales CRM lets our users setup the CRM application on their servers, so that your data remains totally with you. It comes with all the premium features & 1year of premium support from us (subject to renewal beyond that period). The biggest advantage of the on-premises edition is that it can be completely customized to suit your exact requirements. Here's a quick feature snapshot of Wakeupsales CRM, ● Add, edit & manage leads ● Invite & manage your team onboard ● Create, edit or manage all your opportunities ● Customize & manage your sales pipeline ● Add tasks, notes or files to any opportunity ● Send emails to your leads from the CRM ● Convert opportunities into projects ● Basic project management module ● Organization listing for leads ● Multiple currency options ● Reports & analytics & so much more... Some of our premium features include: ● Gmail integration ● Invoice generator ● Web to lead management ● Email tracker ● Goals management Wakeupsales also supports a ton of 3rd party integrations/add-ons such as Freshbooks, Quickbooks, Twilio, Asterisk, CallHippo, Outlook, Sendgrid, Amazon SES, Google calendar, Ring central, Mailchimp etc. that are always made on-order to match your exact requirement. These integrations really let you do even more with the CRM package. Wakeupsales CRM Benefits: ● Central repository of all your leads, opportunities, projects & customers ● Eliminates usage of multiple apps ● Task tracking, to do lists, reminders, email communications all can be done from a single platform ● Absolute transparency w.r.t your leads and associated tasks of your sales team ● Improved collaboration among your sales, marketing & customer success teams ● Track key activities of your sales team w.r.t appointments, proposals & follow-up meetings ● Real-time reports & dashboard for true status of your sales pipeline ● Enables quick & proactive decision making ● Helps achieve higher conversion rates & CSAT scores with timely execution of deals and post-sales delivery Wakeupsales is available on cloud and on-premises

seller_description: Insightly, the new breed of CRM, helps modern businesses of all sizes build lifelong customer relationships and grow faster than ever before. Insightly's out of the box capabilities allow you to tailor each user's experience for every customer facing role. It is easy to use, easy to set up, highly customizable to your industry, and offers fast time to value at a low total cost of ownership. Join more than 1.5M Insightly users who are already building better customer relationships. Founded in 009 and based in San Francisco, Insightly is backed by $38 million in funding over three rounds from leading venture capital firms: Emergence Capital Partners, Cloud Apps Capital Partners, Scott Bommer and Sozo Ventures.

overview: Insightly is the modern, affordable CRM that teams love. It’s easy to use, simple to customize, and scales with companies as they grow, solving common pain points that legacy CRMs can't. Insightly helps teams build and convert sales pipeline, increase productivity, and build lasting customer relationships. Centralize and manage all your customer, sales, and business data—leads, contacts, emails, events, quotes, projects, tasks, opportunities, and business reports—in one easy-to-use, flexible and secure CRM that scales with your business. Increase sales efficiency and transparency with Insightly’s enterprise-grade Products, Price books, and Quotes (PPQ) capabilities. Quickly search, track, and manage millions of distinct products and services right inside the Insightly platform. Connect products and services to individual opportunities, eliminating human errors, bottlenecks, and inconsistencies. With Insightly’s PPQ, your field teams can generate custom quotes, contracts, and proposals for their opportunities with just a few clicks. Enjoy complete control and visibility into what you sell, to whom, when, and at what price. Use Insightly’s custom objects and apps to tailor workflows and processes to your unique business needs and preferences, ensuring high adoption and satisfaction. Use AppConnect to integrate Insightly with more than 500 popular apps. Insightly’s native CRM integrations include: Gmail Google Workspace & Google Apps Google Drive Quickbooks Online Xero Slack Dropbox Box MailChimp Evernote Zapier Facebook Lead Ads And more... Manage everything on the go with award-winning mobile applications for both Android and iOS. Scan business cards and upload all information in one click, update projects and records in real time, and enable your field team to create and update opportunities right at the client's location. Powerful in any vertical, Insightly CRM customers can add companion products for marketing automation, customer service, and integrations in the same platform. Insightly is trusted by more than a million users worldwide.

description: Next4biz CRM is a new generation CRM with digital behavior analysis powered marketing & sales automation and AI powered omni-channel & end-to-end customer service management features.
seller_description: Next4biz is a CRM & BPM software providing features for customer centric digital transformation. Since 2006, It is being used in almost all continents, in more than 20 languages, in almost all sectors and business functions. It is a new generation solution having unique features such as AI, digital footprint analysis, no-code design editors and so forth. Company also provides an implementation and integration methodology called Road Map 2 Success. Next4biz CRM can store all customer data, even their digital footprints. Based on deduplicated & consolidated customer information and using dynamic segmentation features, you can design your own marketing & sales automation. Next4biz CSM provides AI powered omni-channel communication features and workflow design tools for end-to-end customer service management. Next4biz’s low-code BPM module provides tools to design, prototype, rollout, integrate, execute, measure and optimize business automations. Next4biz has no-code design editors which reduces IT dependency. Business users can design and change even interfaces and workflows by themselves.

overview: Next4biz CRM is a new generation CRM with digital behavior analysis, marketing & sales automation, and AI powered end-to-end customer service management features. Marketing & sales features: - Integration to legacy systems with data deduplication - Customer’s digital footprint monitoring - Dynamic segmentation, KPI and scorecard management - Rule-based marketing & sales automation - Opportunity and task management Customer service management features: - Omnichannel communication - AI powered complaint categorization - User interface and agent script design for categories - End-to-end complaint management with workflows - Knowledge base and self service Next4biz CRM is a no-code solution bringing less IT dependency and more agility for sales & service teams. Next4biz CRM can be 2-way integrated with other systems. Next4biz CRM is compliant with GDPR, CCPA, KVKK.

description: Anthill is a process-focused CRM, designed to manage unique customer journeys. Every company in the world operates differently, so we have built a platform to support individual operations and their way of working.
pricing: [{"package":"Standard","price":"£55","price_info":"5 user minimum. Price per user, per month."},{"package":"Professional","price":"£60","price_info":"40 user minimum. Price per user, per month."},{"package":"Enterprise","price":"£75","price_info":"150 user minimum. Price per user, per month."}]
overview: “Our mission is to help companies provide a consistent Customer Experience across teams, channels and locations." Every company in the world works differently, so we have built a platform to work around and support your individual operations and way or working. Plan your unique Customer Journey into customisable workflow streams by allocating actions to teams (Sales, Admin and Support etc), then monitor performance via live and interactive role-based dashboards. Improve efficiency and productivity by triggering personalised notifications at any stage to customers and teams using in-built sales and email automation features. Our 5-star rated success team will be on hand to advise best practise and support you through every stage, from setup and training to on-going success. Increase efficiency, reduce costs and delight customers by using a CRM that allows you to work your way. For more information or to access a free demo, please visit www.anthill.co.uk Visibility / Control / Scalability / Consistency / Automation

position_against_competitors: Product Description Pipeliner is a sales CRM Software for Windows & Mac. Manage your sales pipeline online or offline, from virtually any device.  Pipeliner - CRM Revolutionized - Instant Intelligence, Visualized! Customers tell us again and again--what sets Pipeliner apart from other CRM solutions is its ease of customization, intuitive interfaces and its visualization. Along with these come other powerful, vital functions such as 1-click reporting, robust real-time KPI reports and Performance Insights to compare sales reps or teams. Seller Details Seller Pipelinersales Inc. Company Website www.pipelinersales.com Year Founded 2007 HQ Location Los Angeles, CA Twitter @PipelinerCRM 8,757 Twitter followers LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 132 employees on LinkedIn® Phone (888) 843-6699 Description We build for you a sales CRM application that you will enjoy using! Manage your sales pipeline online or offline, from virtually any device. JH Overview Provided by: Jocelyne Hall SEO,Search Engine Marking & Analyst/ Outsource Manager
overview: Pipeliner CRM drives exceptional user engagement through its sales-friendly interface. With its uniform navigation and visual approach, users can learn the system quickly which drives high adoption rates and faster ROI. Plus users can easily customize what they see to make the system their own. Pipeliner’s administration backend is also visual and easy to use with drag ‘n drop, in-line editing and other non-technical tools. A key differentiator is that Pipeliner does not require a fulltime admin or expensive certified technical resources. There is also a very powerful reporting engine built-into the product which allows reports to be generated from any view or area within the system. There are multiple types of reports available from standard to pivot to advanced and graphical dashboards. At Pipeliner there is a strong belief in focusing on core competencies which is why Pipeliner delivers the best in sales force automation and then provides an easy and seamless way for customers to integrate with other best of breed systems like Ticketing or Marketing Automation or any other system a customer may be using. Pipeliner also provides many “Automation Add-ins” that automate routine tasks that would require manual intervention in other systems. The Pipeliner Mobile CRM App is the most advanced on the market and the only one with the built-in Artificial Intelligence engine, Voyager. With location and mapping features, voice to text, business card scanning and more, the mobile app enables real efficiency on the go.

description: Unnatim Connect offers a flexible and scalable business management solution designed to streamline operations, enhance collaboration, and drive productivity. With features spanning HR management, project planning, invoicing, customer support, and more, Unnatim Connect empowers businesses of all sizes to thrive in today's competitive landscape. Its intuitive interface, customizable workflows, and real-time insights make it easy for teams to stay organized, communicate effectively, and make informed decisions. Whether you're a small startup or a large enterprise, Unnatim Connect offers the tools and resources you need to succeed. Experience the difference with Unnatim Connect today.

description: NinjaPipe is an AI-Powered Sales Platform built to serve 3 key pillars: - AI Automated appointment setting and booking sales calls - Lead aggregation and scoring - Companies can connect their Lead forms and other sources to NP and aggregate all of them in one centralized collection where automation workflows can be performed such as appointment setting, email and SMS campaigns, etc. - Integrated CRM to manage clients and connections NinjaPipe is available on Web, iOS and Android and businesses can use all the in-built tools to perform most business operations without having multiple software installed. Some of the high level features: - AI Sales tools: Sales appointment setting, automated follow ups, lead scoring - Contact management and CRM - Invoicing - Deals and sales management - Sales pipelines and task management - Invite team members for collaboration - Real-time chat with clients - Client portal with company branding - Email & SMS Marketing automation

overview: - Elevate your sales game with NinjaPipe - the ultimate CRM and sales automation tool to revolutionize your lead management and client engagement. - Seamlessly track and nurture leads on your dynamic and fully customizable dashboard, ensuring you never miss a chance to close that crucial deal. Effortlessly automate follow-ups and tasks, guiding leads through the sales funnel for maximum conversions. - Empower your team with an intuitive, visual sales process that promotes seamless collaboration. With NinjaPipe, your team will conquer sales targets with ZERO learning curve, allowing them to focus on what truly matters - delivering exceptional customer experiences. - Stand out from the competition by automating repetitive tasks and reclaiming valuable time to invest in meaningful sales interactions and customer relationships. Key Features: - Personalized Dashboard: Customize your dashboard to suit your unique sales workflow, making lead management a breeze. - Automated Follow-ups: Engage leads consistently and efficiently through automated follow-ups, boosting conversion rates. - Team Collaboration: Foster teamwork and streamline communication to accelerate sales cycles and drive results. - Sales Visualization: Gain real-time insights into your sales pipeline, enabling data-driven decisions for success. - Time-Saving Automation: Free your team from repetitive tasks, allowing them to focus on closing deals and delighting customers. - Join thousands of satisfied users who have transformed their sales processes with NinjaPipe. Download now to supercharge your sales and cultivate customer loyalty like never before!

position_against_competitors: Product Description amoCRM’s easy-to-use, sales management service is a Cloud-based, affordable solution for small to medium sizes businesses  Based upon customer feedback, amoCRM’s top features are lead tracking and web-form integration. amoCRM’s lead management ensures that all leads are being contacted by your sales reps. Customers comment on how easily amoCRM can be setup and customized to match your sales cycle. With proper management of your leads, you will see an increase in your sales. In addition, amoCRM’s web-form integration allows users to generate leads directly from their website. Customer submitted forms will now convert automatically into a new lead and contact within your amoCRM account. Seller Details Seller QSOFT LLC Year Founded 2009 HQ Location San Francisco, CA LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 309 employees on LinkedIn® EK Overview Provided by: Egor Kovalchuk CEO at amoCRM
overview: Kommo is a powerful CRM that helps you build stronger customer relationships. By integrating all major messenger platforms, Kommo makes communication personal and effective. With our code-free chatbot builder, your business is online 24/7, handling customer requests effortlessly. Managers love our analytics, reporting, and automation features to drive smarter decisions. Simplify lead generation with easy integrations and web forms. Chat, call, and email prospects directly from the CRM, where all interactions—calls, messages, and tasks—are securely stored. Perfect for entrepreneurs, small and medium-sized businesses, Kommo is the ultimate sales solution. With workflow automation, your team saves time on repetitive tasks, focusing on closing deals instead. Manage leads, assign tasks, and run email campaigns seamlessly. Our in-depth analytics provide a full view of your sales process, and the mobile app (available on iOS and Android) lets you manage on the go. Setting up Kommo is quick and easy—connect your email and import your customer data in minutes. We offer free onboarding, setup assistance, and multichannel support to ensure you’re ready to succeed. Key Features: • Messenger integration for personal communication • Code-free chatbots for 24/7 support • Unified chat, email, and call functions • Advanced reporting and automation tools • Workflow automation to save time • Free setup and onboarding support Kommo simplifies sales and boosts productivity. Try it for free today!

description: Introducing PromoXcrm, the ultimate solution for seamless management of all their teams, projects, and clients. Designed specifically for promotional products distributors, PromoXcrm is here to revolutionize their business operations and delight their clients like never before. With PromoXcrm, they can now supercharge their efficiency in just a few clicks. No more wasting time on complex tasks or manual work. This user-friendly interface simplifies even the most challenging processes, allowing they to automate tasks and maximize productivity effortlessly. One of the key features of PromoXcrm is its seamless lead management. Say goodbye to scattered spreadsheets and hello to a centralized platform that organizes all their leads in one place. Easily track and manage their sales pipeline, ensuring that no opportunity slips through the cracks. But it doesn't stop there. PromoXcrm also empowers them with insightful reporting, giving they the data they need to make informed decisions swiftly. Identify trends, track performance, and discover potential areas for growth. With PromoXcrm, they have all the tools at their disposal to take their business to new heights.

description: Small business CRM, e-commerce, email and social marketing solution all in one place
seller_description: Keap is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed for small businesses. It offers tools for marketing automation, sales pipeline management, and e-commerce, helping users streamline their processes and enhance customer engagement. Keap provides features like email marketing, appointment scheduling, invoicing, and reporting, all aimed at simplifying business operations and driving growth. Through its user-friendly interface, Keap empowers entrepreneurs to effectively manage their customer relationships and optimize their sales efforts.

position_against_competitors: Product Description Small business CRM, e-commerce, email and social marketing solution all in one place  Keap is the best value for a comprehensive CRM and business automation system, tailored to small businesses ready to scale to $1 million in revenue and beyond! While other competitors might hook you at a lower, entry level price, they inevitably slowly reveal you’ll have to pay more and more to get full use out of their platform. Yet, Keap provides all of the features you’ll need from the start - our prices vary based upon the number of users and customer contacts. For a total of $4,488 for the year, you get the full capabilities of Keap: that’s just $249 per month for 2 users and up to 1,500 contacts, plus the required, one time implementation service of $1,500. We require the implementation services because we are serious automation for your serious business, and our implementation team ensures you get going and start getting value on day one. Seller Details Seller Keap Company Website keap.com Year Founded 2001 HQ Location Chandler, Arizona Twitter @KeapGrowing 33,795 Twitter followers LinkedIn® Page www.linkedin.com 377 employees on LinkedIn® Phone +1 (866) 800-0004 Description Keap is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed for small businesses. It offers tools for marketing automation, sales pipeline management, and e-commerce, helping users streamline their processes and enhance customer engagement. Keap provides features like email marketing, appointment scheduling, invoicing, and reporting, all aimed at simplifying business operations and driving growth. Through its user-friendly interface, Keap empowers entrepreneurs to effectively manage their customer relationships and optimize their sales efforts. JS Overview Provided by: Jill Shaw
overview: Keap is a small business CRM and automation platform designed to grow your profitable business. With Keap, you'll easily capture, organize, track, and nurture all of your leads to increase sales and revenue. The Keap CRM has everything you need to automate your business: lead capture and management, sales automation, marketing automation, email automation and text marketing.

overview: Livespace is a CRM designed for B2B sales teams looking to boost efficiency and predictability in their sales process. Livespace helps you attract more clients in less time with its powerful tool and sales management expertise. Trusted by over 1000 companies, Livespace stands out from other tools like Pipedrive and HubSpot by allowing you to accurately describe and continuously improve your actual sales process. This means less worries for business owners. Sales managers gain complete control over their team's activities, and sales reps achieve better results. As a result, your company can reduce chaos, predictably increase sales, and grow safely.

description: KEI CRM takes existing customer data (contact information, email, financial and more) and leverages it to improve marketing efforts by compiling the target market into a manageable resource for direct communications to the right person, or prospective customer. Users will improve customer communications because the auto messaging feature lets them know the minute users have received a message from them. The Document Management (an integral part of our KEI CRM system) matches messages to customer files by date, no more hunting for paper files. When users are ready to respond, all the customer's data is right in front of them.

description: Grow CRM is a client management application, which comes with a wide set of features, including, project management, time tracking, invoicing, estimates, tasks and many more. The CRM’s features are all designed to save you and your team time. Grow CRM has an intuitive, clean and modern user interface, which has need designed to be very easy to use. The application is self-hosted, which means there are no monthly payments. You only pay once and use forever. Here are just some of the features that come with the application Project Management You no longer need to use multiple tools to get the job done. All the tools that you need, in a single application. Time Tracking Keep track of the amount of time that you spend on your project tasks which can be billed to your client. Invoices & Payments Your clients can pay you via Paypal or Stripe. We will be adding more payment gateways in the near future. Estimates Estimates help you to convert your leads into orders. Clients are more willing to commit to a project when they have an idea of the total cost. Recurring Billing You can create daily, weekly, monthly or even yearly recurring invoices. Leads & Opportunities Keep track of your opportunities and nurture your leads into paying customers. Knowledgebase Lower your customer support time by offering your customers access to a self-service information and help repository.

overview: Prospect, the #1 Stock-Aware CRM, is perfect for growing Wholesale, Distributor and Manufacturing businesses. Sell more, in less time, every time - with Prospect CRM! Stock-Aware CRM combines the best of traditional CRM – Marketing, Sales Pipelines and Customer Service Management – with the reality of selling B2B products – quoting, ordering, inventory management, special pricing, back orders, product information and even contracts, serial numbers and asset tracking...to ensure your sales and service teams are fully Stock-Aware.
